item.title: Status message in M5
item.description: There’s a very interesting part of the gem5 Coding Style document, talking about different message status from M5. I consider them very useful for further work.

item.title: About
item.description: Greeting, I’m retrhelo. I’m currently a student in Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST), interested in Computer Architecture and Operating System.

item.title: Initial Post
item.description: I start this blog website recently, willing to document my experiences during work, and to practice my writting skills.
